body.p: In response to these concerns, the IASB decided to add application guidance on portfolios to IFRS 16. The guidance clarifies that an entity is permitted to apply the requirements in IFRS 16 to a portfolio of leases with similar characteristics, if the entity reasonably expects that the effects on the financial statements of applying IFRS 16 to the portfolio would not differ materially from applying IFRS 16 to the individual leases within that portfolio. This approach may be particularly useful for lessees with a large number of similar leases.
